params._recipient: Address that will receive the accumulated fees.

returns._0: Semver contract version as a string.

MIN_WITHDRAWAL_AMOUNT().notice: Minimum balance before a withdrawal can be triggered.

RECIPIENT().notice: Wallet that will receive the fees on L1.

totalProcessed().notice: Total amount of wei processed by the contract.

version().notice: Returns the full semver contract version.

withdraw().notice: Triggers a withdrawal of funds to the L1 fee wallet.

Withdrawal(uint256,address,address).notice: Emits each time that a withdrawal occurs.

userdoc.notice: The BaseFeeVault accumulates the base fee that is paid by transactions.
